title: moto g‚Å∑ Review: Does Moto still make budget magic?
description:
The Moto G series has long been a favorite in the budget smartphone space, but with more and more competition, Motorola's feeling the heat. The latest generation is the G7, and our review takes a look at this new entry-level mid-ranger from Moto.

Music credit: https://www.youtube.com/joakimkarud
